./external/basejump_stl/bsg_mem/bsg_mem_1rw_sync.v Cov: 87.5% 

   1: // MBT 11/9/2014
   2: //
   3: // Synchronous 1-port ram.
   4: // Only one read or one write may be done per cycle.
   5: //
   6: 
   7: module bsg_mem_1rw_sync #(parameter width_p=-1
   8:                           , parameter els_p=-1
   9:                           , parameter latch_last_read_p=0
  10:                           , parameter addr_width_lp=`BSG_SAFE_CLOG2(els_p)
  11:                           , parameter enable_clock_gating_p=0
  12:                           )
  13:    (input   clk_i
  14:     , input reset_i
  15:     , input [width_p-1:0] data_i
  16:     , input [addr_width_lp-1:0] addr_i
  17:     , input v_i
  18:     , input w_i
  19:     , output logic [width_p-1:0]  data_o
  20:     );
  21: 
  22:    wire clk_lo;
  23: 
  24:    if (enable_clock_gating_p)
  25:      begin
  26:        bsg_clkgate_optional icg
  27:          (.clk_i( clk_i )
  28:          ,.en_i( v_i )
  29:          ,.bypass_i( 1'b0 )
  30:          ,.gated_clock_o( clk_lo )
  31:          );
  32:      end
  33:    else
  34:      begin
  35:        assign clk_lo = clk_i;
  36:      end
  37: 
  38:    bsg_mem_1rw_sync_synth
  39:      #(.width_p(width_p)
  40:        ,.els_p(els_p)
  41:        ,.latch_last_read_p(latch_last_read_p)
  42:        ) synth
  43:     (.clk_i( clk_lo )
  44:     ,.reset_i
  45:     ,.data_i
  46:     ,.addr_i
  47:     ,.v_i
  48:     ,.w_i
  49:     ,.data_o
  50:     );
  51: 
  52: endmodule
  53:
